name: Guardians of Orion (Phase 1)
description: Guardians of Orion is a Sci-Fi Co-op Horde Shooter featuring Dinosaurs & Robots. Complete Mission Objectives all over the Galaxy with your friends to earn new Gear & Rewards!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Quad-Core Intel/AMD Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 500 Series/AMD Radeon 5000 Series or higher (SM3) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Quad-Core Intel/AMD Processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 700 Series/AMD Radeon 7000 Series or higher (SM3) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 20 GB available space
